Hey all,
    I'm in the mood to add some new cards to my collection. I have about 80+ cards, some very nice ones too. If anyone wants to try to make a trade, please send me a PM. I would love to make a deal with someone. Lemme know what you have and I'll do the same. 

Best regards,
Wazoo

Hi
Any chance you have any sovereign cubs?
Sean :)
